title: League capped at 60 fps (solved)
body:
Problem: game caps itself at 60 fps and adds input lag.

The problem arises for me when i play a game after unplugging my laptop and then plugging it back in. It's pretty frustrating as this happens frequently (that's kinda the point of a laptop...). I've had this issue since i've had the laptop, and none of the popular solutions worked for me. I finally solved it, so i'll post my solution at the bottom along with a couple other solutions for others having this problem as I know how frustrating it is. 

Possible solutions: make sure v-sync is disabled both in game and in the nvidia control panel (or AMD equivalent). open the Xbox app, go to settings, make sure the "record games and screenshots" button is off. There are probably a few other things that may cause this that I'm forgetting, but these are the big 3. None of these worked for me, so if that's the case for you then read below for my solution. 

open file explorer and go to  C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln\releases\0.0.1.198\deploy

right click "league of legends.exe" and select "properties"

go to the compatibility tab

check the "disable fullscreen optimizations" box and hit "apply"

After that you should be back to regular uncapped fps without any input lag. 

Hope this helps anyone else suffering from this problem as well that can't find a solution yet! 

Credit to /u/Bluemer_98 on this reddit thread that I randomly found. https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/7hy5qo/fullscreen_capped_at_60_fps_borderlesswindowed/?st=jbq7h6vm&sh=bd04c303

If you know him give him a hug, he's a god.

replies.body: That might be happening from the laptop power settings for AC power and battery power being different. Glad you found a workaround, but I'd go ahead and give those settings a check as well to see if you can get the same performance whether you're plugged in or not!
Finally! That fixed both my capped FPS and latency issue! Thank you! :)
or just set your fps setting to uncapped at settings lol
